realtime_memories.content: User preferences: Be explicit about required actions. Don't assume context. Prefers directness over hedging. Wants parallel agent swarms for multi-page reviews. Always commit+push after completing agent waves. Kill ports: lsof -ti :5173 | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -ti :5174 | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -ti :8000 | xargs -r kill -9. Backend start: cd /home/mattb/projects/dashboard_interface_project/backend && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000. Alembic: PYTHONPATH=. alembic upgrade head (from backend dir).

Architecture: Frontend (Vite/React) port 5173, Backend (FastAPI/uvicorn) port 8000. Main DB: PostgreSQL localhost:5432/dashboard_interface_data (30 properties, 25/30 deals with extraction). Market data DB: PostgreSQL localhost:5432/dashboard_market_data (same port, separate DB). Data pipeline: 28 Excel files -> 26 properties, 30,394 values across 11 categories. IRR: LP_RETURNS_IRR/MOIC fallback (0.12-0.23). Key types: leveredIrr/leveredMoic/unleveredIrr(nullable)/unleveredMoic(nullable). operations.expenses: 12 categories + total. financing.lender and maturityDate nullable.

COMPLETED FEATURES: 6-stage DealStage (alembic c3d4e5f6a7b8). FinancialsTab/OperationsTab/Performance metrics. Deal Timeline 9 metrics. Mapping coordinate validation. UP042 StrEnum migration. Underwriting Modal full-screen. Deals Kanban fallback. Analytics Cap Rate vs DSCR + dateRange. GlobalSearch wired to API. Cash-on-Cash metric fixed. Error handling on MarketPage/MappingPage/AnalyticsPage. CI quality gates blocking (mypy/ruff/ESLint/bandit), coverage thresholds backend 45%/frontend 50%. Pre-commit config added. All tests green: 328 frontend + 1049 backend.

MARKET DATA PIPELINE COMPLETE (commit 9d4f961): DB schema at backend/database/schemas/market_data_schema.sql (5 tables, 2 materialized views, 17 FRED series pre-populated). Extractors: CoStarParser (~50K records), FREDExtractor (17 series, ~200K records), CensusExtractor (~30 records). Scheduler with APScheduler cron jobs. Admin endpoints at /admin/market-data/*. market_data.py + interest_rates.py rewritten with DB-first + static fallbacks + data_source field. Frontend sparklines derive from API trends. ACTIVATION PENDING: User needs to run createdb + psql schema + initial extraction scripts.

REMAINING AUDIT ITEMS: 1) defaultReportSettings — needs backend GET/PUT /reporting/settings endpoint. 2) Auth security — localStorage JWT to httpOnly cookies + CSRF. 3) Zod runtime validation on API responses. 4) Code quality refactors (_to_frontend_property 287 lines, React.memo on 8 components, type guards replacing 45+ 'as' assertions). 5) Process guardrails (PR template, CODEOWNERS, Dependabot). 6) Operational infra (Sentry, structured logging, branch protection).

**0 errors across all 134 source files.** Only informational notes remain (untyped function bodies — not errors).
